alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 3:14PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nye County through 415 PM PDT... At 311 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms near Round Mountain, extending nortwest, south of Gabbs and moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Round Mountain, Manhattan, Tonopah, Carvers, Saulsbury Summit, Table Mountain, Hadley, Tonopah Airport and Mount Jefferson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
